# FormatFlagIsAlignedHigh

**Enumeration Case**

A flag to indicate whether sample bits use the high bits of the channel.

## Declaration

```swift
FormatFlagIsAlignedHigh
```

## Discussion

Set this value if sample bits use the high end of the channel; clear it to use the low end. This flag is only valid if [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsPacked] is clear.

## Bitwise Layout Flags

- **LinearPCMFormatFlagIsAlignedHigh**: A flag to indicate whether PCM sample bits use the high bits of the channel.
- **FormatFlagIsPacked**: A flag to indicate whether sample bits use all available bits of the channel.
- **LinearPCMFormatFlagIsPacked**: A flag to indicate whether PCM sample bits use all available bits of the channel.
- **FormatFlagsNativeFloatPacked**: A flag indicating native-endian packed floating-point values.
